00101     public String getDefaultDriver(String url) {
00102         if (url.startsWith("jdbc:postgresql:")) {
00103             return "org.postgresql.Driver";
00104         }
00105         return null;
00106     }

00140     protected String getDefaultDatabaseSchemaName() throws JDBCException {
00141 
00142         if (defaultDatabaseSchemaName == null) {
00143             try {
00144                 List<String> searchPaths = getSearchPaths();
00145                 if (searchPaths != null && searchPaths.size() > 0) {
00146                     for (String searchPath : searchPaths) {
00147                         if (searchPath != null && searchPath.length() > 0) {
00148                             defaultDatabaseSchemaName = searchPath;
00149 
00150                             if (defaultDatabaseSchemaName.equals("$user") && getConnectionUsername() != null) {
00151                                 if (! schemaExists(getConnectionUsername())) {
00152                                     defaultDatabaseSchemaName = null;
00153                                 } else {
00154                                     defaultDatabaseSchemaName = getConnectionUsername();
00155                                 }
00156                             }
00157 
00158                             if (defaultDatabaseSchemaName != null)
00159                                 break;
00160                         }
00161                     }
00162                 }
00163             } catch (Exception e) {
00164                 // TODO: throw?
00165                 e.printStackTrace();
00166                 log.log(Level.SEVERE, "Failed to get default catalog name from postgres", e);
00167             }
00168         }
00169 
00170         return defaultDatabaseSchemaName;
00171     }

00205     public SqlStatement createFindSequencesSQL(String schema) throws JDBCException {
00206         return new RawSqlStatement("SELECT relname AS SEQUENCE_NAME FROM pg_class, pg_namespace " +
00207                 "WHERE relkind='S' " +
00208                 "AND pg_class.relnamespace = pg_namespace.oid " +
00209                 "AND nspname = '" + convertRequestedSchemaToSchema(schema) + "' " +
00210                 "AND 'nextval(''" + (schema == null ? "" : schema + ".") + "'||relname||'''::regclass)' not in (select adsrc from pg_attrdef where adsrc is not null) " +
00211                 "AND 'nextval(''" + (schema == null ? "" : schema + ".") + "\"'||relname||'\"''::regclass)' not in (select adsrc from pg_attrdef where adsrc is not null) " +
00212                 "AND 'nextval('''||relname||'''::regclass)' not in (select adsrc from pg_attrdef where adsrc is not null)"
00213         );
00214     }

00217     public boolean isSystemTable(String catalogName, String schemaName, String tableName) {
00218         return super.isSystemTable(catalogName, schemaName, tableName)
00219                 || "pg_catalog".equals(schemaName)
00220                 || "pg_toast".equals(schemaName)
00221                 || tableName.endsWith("_seq")
00222                 || tableName.endsWith("_key")
00223                 || tableName.endsWith("_pkey")
00224                 || tableName.startsWith("idx_")
00225                 || tableName.startsWith("pk_");
00226     }

00233     public SqlStatement getViewDefinitionSql(String schemaName, String name) throws JDBCException {
00234         return new RawSqlStatement("select definition from pg_views where viewname='" + name + "' AND schemaname='" + convertRequestedSchemaToSchema(schemaName) + "'");
00235     }

00238     public String getColumnType(String columnType, Boolean autoIncrement) {
00239         if (columnType.startsWith("java.sql.Types.VARCHAR")) { //returns "name" for type
00240             return columnType.replace("java.sql.Types.", "");
00241         }
00242 
00243         String type = super.getColumnType(columnType, autoIncrement);
00244 
00245         if (type.startsWith("TEXT(")) {
00246             return getClobType();
00247         } else if (type.toLowerCase().startsWith("float8")) {
00248             return "FLOAT8";
00249         } else if (type.toLowerCase().startsWith("float4")) {
00250             return "FLOAT4";
00251         }
00252 
00253 
00254         if (autoIncrement != null && autoIncrement) {
00255             if ("integer".equals(type.toLowerCase())) {
00256                 return "serial";
00257             } else if ("bigint".equals(type.toLowerCase()) || "bigserial".equals(type.toLowerCase())) {
00258                 return "bigserial";
00259             } else {
00260                 // Unknown integer type, default to "serial"
00261                 return "serial";
00262             }
00263         }
00264 
00265         return type;
00266     }
00267

00274     public Object convertDatabaseValueToJavaObject(Object defaultValue, int dataType, int columnSize, int decimalDigits) throws ParseException {
00275         if (defaultValue != null) {
00276             if (defaultValue instanceof String) {
00277                 defaultValue = ((String) defaultValue).replaceAll("'::[\\w\\s]+$", "'");
00278 
00279                 if (dataType == Types.DATE || dataType == Types.TIME || dataType == Types.TIMESTAMP) {
00280                     //remove trailing time zone info
00281                     defaultValue = ((String) defaultValue).replaceFirst("-\\d+$", "");
00282                 }
00283             }
00284         }
00285         return super.convertDatabaseValueToJavaObject(defaultValue, dataType, columnSize, decimalDigits);
00286 
00287     }
00288 
00289     public String convertRequestedSchemaToSchema(String requestedSchema) throws JDBCException {
00290         if (requestedSchema == null) {
00291             // Return the catalog name instead..
00292             return getDefaultCatalogName();
00293         } else {
00294             return StringUtils.trimToNull(requestedSchema).toLowerCase();
00295         }
00296     }

00300     }

00305     @Override
00306     public String escapeTableName(String schemaName, String tableName) {
00307         //Check if tableName is in reserved words and has CaseSensitivity problems
00308         if (StringUtils.trimToNull(tableName) != null && (hasCaseProblems(tableName) || isReservedWord(tableName))) {
00309             return super.escapeTableName(schemaName, "\"" + tableName + "\"");
00310         }
00311         return super.escapeTableName(schemaName, tableName);
00312     }
00313 
00314     public String escapeConstraintName(String constraintName) {
00315         if (constraintName == null) {
00316             return null;
00317         }
00318         if (hasCaseProblems(constraintName) || isReservedWord(constraintName)) {
00319             return "\"" + constraintName + "\"";
00320         } else {
00321             return super.escapeConstraintName(constraintName);
00322         }
00323     }
00324 
00328     @Override
00329     public String escapeColumnName(String schemaName, String tableName, String columnName) {
00330         if (hasCaseProblems(columnName) || isReservedWord(columnName)) {
00331             return "\"" + columnName + "\"";
00332         }
00333         return columnName;
00334     }
00335 
00336     /*
00337     * Check if given string has case problems according to postgresql documentation.
00338     * If there are at least one characters with upper case while all other are in lower case (or vice versa) this string should be escaped.
00339     */
00340     private boolean hasCaseProblems(String tableName) {
00341         return tableName.matches(".*[A-Z].*") && tableName.matches(".*[a-z].*");
00342     }
00343 
00344     /*
00345     * Check if given string is reserved word.
00346     */
00347     private boolean isReservedWord(String tableName) {
00348         for (int i = 0; i != this.reservedWords.length; i++)
00349             if (this.reservedWords[i].toLowerCase().equalsIgnoreCase(tableName))
00350                 return true;
00351         return false;
00352     }
00353 
00354     /*
00355     * Reserved words from postgresql documentation
00356     */
00357     private String[] reservedWords = new String[]{"ALL", "ANALYSE", "ANALYZE", "AND", "ANY", "ARRAY", "AS", "ASC", "ASYMMETRIC", "AUTHORIZATION", "BETWEEN", "BINARY", "BOTH", "CASE", "CAST", "CHECK", "COLLATE", "COLUMN", "CONSTRAINT", "CORRESPONDING", "CREATE", "CROSS", "CURRENT_DATE", "CURRENT_ROLE", "CURRENT_TIME", "CURRENT_TIMESTAMP", "CURRENT_USER", "DEFAULT", "DEFERRABLE", "DESC", "DISTINCT", "DO", "ELSE", "END", "EXCEPT", "FALSE", "FOR", "FOREIGN", "FREEZE", "FROM", "FULL", "GRANT", "GROUP", "HAVING",
00358             "ILIKE", "IN", "INITIALLY", "INNER", "INTERSECT", "INTO", "IS", "ISNULL", "JOIN", "LEADING", "LEFT", "LIKE", "LIMIT", "LOCALTIME", "LOCALTIMESTAMP", "NATURAL", "NEW", "NOT", "NOTNULL", "NULL", "OFF", "OFFSET", "OLD", "ON", "ONLY", "OPEN", "OR", "ORDER", "OUTER", "OVERLAPS", "PLACING", "PRIMARY", "REFERENCES", "RETURNING", "RIGHT", "SELECT", "SESSION_USER", "SIMILAR", "SOME", "SYMMETRIC", "TABLE", "THEN", "TO", "TRAILING", "TRUE", "UNION", "UNIQUE", "USER", "USING", "VERBOSE", "WHEN", "WHERE"};
00359 
00360     /*
00361      * Get the current search paths
00362      */
00363     private List<String> getSearchPaths() {
00364         List<String> searchPaths = null;
00365 
00366         try {
00367             DatabaseConnection con = getConnection();
00368 
00369             if (con != null) {
00370                 Statement stmt = con.createStatement(
00371                         ResultSet.TYPE_SCROLL_INSENSITIVE,
00372                         ResultSet.CONCUR_READ_ONLY);
00373 
00374                 ResultSet searchPathQry = stmt.executeQuery("SHOW search_path");
00375 
00376                 if (searchPathQry.next()) {
00377                     String searchPathResult = searchPathQry.getString(1);
00378                     if (searchPathResult != null) {
00379                         String dirtySearchPaths[] = searchPathResult.split("\\,");
00380                         searchPaths = new ArrayList<String>();
00381                         for (String searchPath : dirtySearchPaths) {
00382                             searchPath = searchPath.trim();
00383 
00384                             // Ensure there is consistency ..
00385                             if (searchPath.equals("\"$user\"")) {
00386                                 searchPath = "$user";
00387                             }
00388 
00389                             searchPaths.add(searchPath);
00390                         }
00391                     }
00392                 }
00393 
00394             }
00395         } catch (Exception e) {
00396             // TODO: Something?
00397             e.printStackTrace();
00398             log.log(Level.SEVERE, "Failed to get default catalog name from postgres", e);
00399         }
00400 
00401         return searchPaths;
00402     }
00403 
00404 
00405     private boolean catalogExists(String catalogName) throws SQLException {
00406         if (catalogName != null) {
00407             return runExistsQuery("select count(*) from information_schema.schemata where catalog_name='" + catalogName + "'");
00408         } else {
00409             return false;
00410         }
00411     }
00412 
00413     private boolean schemaExists(String schemaName) throws SQLException {
00414         if (schemaName != null) {
00415             return runExistsQuery("select count(*) from information_schema.schemata where schema_name='" + schemaName + "'");
00416         } else {
00417             return false;
00418         }
00419     }
00420 
00421     private boolean runExistsQuery(String query) throws SQLException {
00422         DatabaseConnection con = getConnection();
00423 
00424         Statement stmt = con.createStatement(
00425                 ResultSet.TYPE_SCROLL_INSENSITIVE,
00426                 ResultSet.CONCUR_READ_ONLY);
00427 
00428         ResultSet existsQry = stmt.executeQuery(query);
00429 
00430         if (existsQry.next()) {
00431             Integer count = existsQry.getInt(1);
00432 
00433             if (count != null && count > 0) {
00434                 return true;
00435             }
00436         }
00437 
00438         return false;
00439     }

00442         return new PostgresDatabaseSnapshot(this, statusListeners, schema);
00443     }

00446     public String escapeSequenceName(String schemaName, String sequenceName) {
00447         //Check if tableName is in reserved words and has CaseSensitivity problems
00448         if (StringUtils.trimToNull(sequenceName) != null && (hasCaseProblems(sequenceName) || isReservedWord(sequenceName))) {
00449             return super.escapeSequenceName(schemaName, "\"" + sequenceName + "\"");
00450         }
00451         return super.escapeSequenceName(schemaName, sequenceName);
00452     }
00453 
00454     protected Object convertToCorrectJavaType(String value, int dataType, int columnSize, int decimalDigits) throws ParseException {
00455         Object returnValue = super.convertToCorrectJavaType(value, dataType, columnSize, decimalDigits);
00456         if (returnValue != null && returnValue instanceof String) {
00457             if (((String) returnValue).startsWith("NULL::")) {
00458                 return null;
00459             }
00460         }
00461         return returnValue;
00462     }
00463 
00464     public String escapeColumnNameList(String columnNames) {
00465         StringBuffer sb = new StringBuffer();
00466         for(String columnName : columnNames.split(",")) {
00467             if(sb.length() > 0) {
00468                 sb.append(", ");
00469             }
00470             String name = columnName.trim();
00471             if (hasCaseProblems(name) || isReservedWord(name)) {
00472                 name = "\""+name+"\"";
00473             }
00474             sb.append(name);
00475         }
00476         return sb.toString();
00477     }
